new_nic.description: Take a photo of your birth certificate or identity document to automatically extract and fill basic information like your name, date of birth, and place of birth.

captureInstructions: Place the document on a flat surface
Make sure all text is visible and clear

troubleshooting.poorQuality: Try better lighting and hold the camera steady
troubleshooting.noTextFound: Ensure the document is clearly visible and try again
troubleshooting.wrongDocument: Please scan a birth certificate or valid identity document

replace_nic.title: Scan Identity Document
replace_nic.description: Take a photo of your existing NIC (if available) or birth certificate to automatically extract your personal information.

captureInstructions: Scan your existing NIC or birth certificate
Ensure the card/document is not damaged or faded
Keep all edges visible in the frame

troubleshooting.damagedCard: Try scanning a clearer section or use birth certificate instead
troubleshooting.reflection: Avoid direct light that causes reflections on the card
troubleshooting.blurry: Hold the camera steady and tap to focus

correct_nic.title: Scan Current NIC

captureInstructions: If correcting names, also scan supporting documents
Use good lighting to avoid shadows

troubleshooting.multipleDocuments: Scan each document separately for best results
troubleshooting.corrections: The system will help identify what needs to be corrected
troubleshooting.supporting: Supporting documents help verify correct information
